# EXISTING STRUCTURES

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when getting an entity at a given position
-  Ensure that an entity of the specified type exists at the given position before attempting to get it. The agent attempted to get a `burner-mining-drill` at position `x=6.5 y=-60.5` and `x=4.5 y=-58.5` but there was no entity of that type at that position.
